title: Studio Apartment Home with City View on Rittenhouse Square, Roof Deck
description:
The studio apartment home at 507 is available for lease at this moment! This 400 square foot Dali studio apartment home on the 5th floor features large windows that face north and have a city skyline view. You may gaze upon skyscrapers like BNY Mellon Center, Comcast Center, One Liberty Place, and Two Liberty Place. This renovated kitchen is nice with its white cabinets and granite countertops. This kitchen is fully-equipped with a dishwasher, disposal, microwave, and gas stove. The renovated bathroom tile is white. This home has wood floors. The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home as early as October 17, 2022!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to shopping, dining, and more! Go grocery shopping at the Rittenhouse Market, Sue's Produce Market, Trader Joe's, Giant, Target, Di Bruno Bros., Reading Terminal Market, Giant Heirloom Market, Aldi, Sprouts, and Whole Foods. Browse the books at Barnes & Noble. Shop at the retail stores on Rittenhouse Row such as Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Paper Source, gorjana, J. Crew, Philadelphia Runner, Allbirds, Brooklinen, Vince, Urban Outfitters, Theory, Tselaine, Ritual Shoppe, MAC Cosmetics, Sephora, Nordstrom Rack. Dine out at Rouge, Devon, Parc, Barclay Prime, Pietro's, Pizzeria Vetri, Luke's Lobster Rittenhouse, Tria Cafe Rittenhouse, a.kitchen, Spice Finch, HipCityVeg, The Love, Via Locusta, The Dandelion, and The Continental Mid-town. Have a French dessert at Miel Patisserie. Savor scoops of gelato from Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Indulge in ice cream at nearby Van Leeuwen or Jeni's. Pick up warm cookies from Insomnia Cookies. Indulge in a decadent Sunday brunch at Green Eggs. Stroll across the park and then grab a French baguette at Metropolitan Bakery. Pick up a selection of scones from The Bakeshop on 20th. Relax with a manicure or pedicure at Philly Nails Bar, Nail Spa Bar, or Coco Blue Spruce. Catch a show at one of the many nearby theatres. Wander around the Rodin Museum. Shop at the weekly farmer's market every Saturday and Tuesday from 9:00 AM to 2:00 PM. There is so much to do in this area!
Community Amenities:
* Amazing roof deck with fantastic views
* Top-of-the-line fitness center with a park view
* 8,000 square foot resident lounge with free wifi
* Sauna
* Pet-friendly building complete with a dog spa! Please note that certain restrictions apply.
* Fitness/yoga studio

title: MOVE-IN SPECIAL! Luxury 3BD/3Bath New Construction House
description:
Newly constructed spacious house for rent! Special attention has been given to each and every detail in the building of this state-of-the-art home. Located in the Grays Ferry section of South Philadelphia, in close proximity to University of Pennsylvania, High way I-76 and the retail corridor, this home is surrounded by numerous new constructions and recent rehab projects.
This gorgeous home has 3 bedrooms with 3 custom bathrooms. The home boasts hardwood flooring, recessed lighting, smoke/carbon monoxide detectors, fire-sprinkler system, and is also cable ready. Enter the home to be greeted by a well-lit and spacious grand living room. Past the sun-lit grand living room you will find your state-of-the-art open galley kitchen. The beautifully appointed kitchen is outfitted with soft-close cabinets, modern Quartz counter-tops, contemporary backsplash, deep sink with chef's faucet, SS Samsung appliance package (dishwasher, fridge, range, microwave), and under cabinet lighting. From the kitchen via you will find the entrance to your private backyard. From the first floor, commercial grade Pine staircases (secured by custom railing) lead you up to the 2nd level of the house. Here the home presents a large room with a spacious organized closet, a huge bathroom with a custom vanity set, and laundry room. Following the staircase to the 3rd level, you enter to your own private oasis. The 3rd floor has another large bedroom, custom spa-like bathroom, and a spacious closet! The master bath boasts custom tile-work, dual vanity set, soaking tub and a designer rainfall shower. Take another step up the stairs to the pilot-house where you will find the access to your private dual rooftop decks. The home has electric and water lines on the rooftop, making it an ideal area to host parties and get-togethers. The finished basement offers another spacious bedroom or home office, custom full bathroom, and utility closet.
Extra included bonuses: Large High Energy Efficient windows, Built-in (Bluetooth enabled) speakers in living room & master bedroom, energy efficient DUAL zoned HVAC, organized closet shelving system, Nest camera in front and rear of home, Schlage keyless door lock in front, LED recessed lighting, digital thermostats, and much more! MUST SEE! Home has approximately 1850 SqFt of living space. Located close to public transportation, highway, nightlife, grocery stores, and restaurants. Ask us about our Move-In special for September 2022!

title: Renovated One Bedroom Apartment Home on Rittenhouse Square, Roof Deck
description:
The home at 315 is available for lease at this moment! This 575 square foot Warhol one bedroom one bathroom apartment home on the 3rd floor features large windows that mainly face south and have a view of Chancellor Street. One window in the living and dining room area faces west for morning shade and afternoon sunshine and has a park view. This renovated kitchen is nice with its white cabinets and granite countertops. This kitchen is fully-equipped with a dishwasher, disposal, microwave, and gas stove. The renovated bathroom tile is white. This home has neutral carpet. The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home as early as September 13, 2022!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to shopping, dining, and more! Go grocery shopping at the Rittenhouse Market, Sue's Produce Market, Trader Joe's, Giant, Target, Di Bruno Bros., Aldi, Reading Terminal Market, Giant Heirloom Market, Whole Foods, or Sprouts. Browse the books at Barnes & Noble. Shop at the retail stores on Rittenhouse Row such as Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Philadelphia Runner, gorjana, Paper Source, J. Crew, Philadelphia Runner, Allbirds, The Dr. Martens Store, Brooklinen, Vince, Urban Outfitters, Theory, Tselaine, MAC Cosmetics, Sephora, and Nordstrom Rack. Experience fine dining at Rouge, Devon, Parc, Barclay Prime, or Pietro's. Pick up a turkey club at Marathon on the Square. Savor a coffee and croissant at La Colombe or Ultimo. Have a beautiful French dessert at Miel Patisserie. Savor scoops of gelato from Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Indulge in French ice cream at nearby Van Leeuwen. Stroll across the park and then grab a French baguette at Metropolitan Bakery. Buy scones from The Bakeshop on 20th. Catch a show at one of the many nearby theaters. Wander around the Rodin Museum or Barnes Foundation. Check out the Mutter Museum. Relax with a manicure or pedicure at Philly Nails Bar, Spa Nail Bar, or Coco Blue Spruce. Shop at the weekly farmer's market every Saturday and Tuesday from 9:00 AM to 2:00 PM. There is so much to do in this area!
Community Amenities:
* Sauna
* Top-of-the-line fitness center with park view
* 8,000 square foot resident lounge with free wifi
* Pet-friendly building complete with a dog spa! Please note that certain restrictions apply.
* Fitness/yoga studio
* Package lockers
* Bike storage
* Amazing roof deck with fantastic views
* Nightly guest suites for the family and friends of current residents
* Elevator building with 24-hour front door attendant and 24-hour concierge desk staff
* 24/7 maintenance
* Laundry room on every floor
* Larger laundry facility on the 3rd floor
* Attached valet parking garage! Please note that these parking spaces are not owned nor managed by community and the cost is separate.
Apartment Home Features:
* Unfurnished one bedroom one bathroom apartment home on 3rd floor
* Dishwasher
* Gas stove
* Microwave
* Disposal
* White kitchen cabinets
* Granite kitchen countertops
* Renovated bathroom
* Neutral carpet
* Large mainly south-facing windows with Chancellor Street view
* One west-facing window with park view
* All utilities included (except cable and internet)
Wondering if this home is still available? Visit our website at rittenhouseclaridge.com to check if 315 is still listed under the Warhol floor plan! Please make an appointment to tour with Michelle using ResMate, our chatbot concierge, on our website at rittenhouseclaridge.com 24/7. We welcome you to tour your new home in person. Live virtual tours in Zoom are also available!
Rittenhouse Claridge
201 South 18th Street
Philadelphia, PA 19103
Price posted is for the 22 month lease term.
2-22 month lease terms available!
Rental rates, availability, and apartment home features are subject to change without notice.
Welcome home!

title: We offer studios to penthouses in a variety of layouts
description:
The all-new Piazza Alta has been designed from the ground up to be a truly elevating city living experience. We offer studios to penthouses in a variety of layouts and stunning finishes. All apartments offer Brazilian oak hardwood flooring, oversized windows allowing abundant natural sunlight, ceiling fans in every room, washer/dryer in unit, plenty of closet space. Kitchens include custom cabinetry with soft-close drawers throughout, quartz counters, slab backslashes and mood setting under cabinet lighting. Bathrooms feature an exhilarating waterfall rain shower head with hand-held spray wands and body jets, shower benches and glass doors, illuminated medicine cabinets and storage vanities. Apartments can be found in the dark modern scheme Sleek design, the bright contemporary Scandinavian design or the warm Timeless design. There is absolutely no wrong way to live luxurious. Now let's talk amenities. First, to say we have a pool would be modest. The Aqua Foro pool club is a 25k sq ft rooftop aquatic paradise. Lap and lounge pools, hot tubs, kitchens, cabanas and even a splash pad for the kids. Our 15k sq ft fitness and recovery center features state of the art equipment, Peloton bikes, a massive outdoor terrace, and residents can enjoy regular complimentary trainer-led fitness classes. Also, the fitness center offers relaxing his and her spas with high pressure showers, dry saunas, steam rooms, stand up tanning, and hydro massage beds. If you're looking for a refreshing atmosphere to finish up some work at home or meet up with friends look no further than our 5k sq ft cafe & lounge area. Enjoy a cup of coffee at the stylish diner booths, kick back on a comfortable couch with friends or take in beautiful city views from the outdoor terrace. Located in the beating heart of Northern Liberties just steps away from supermarkets, restaurants, bowling alleys, live music and comedy club venues. A few minutes from nearby highways granting quick and easy access to concerts, sporting events, shopping malls and everything downtown center city has to offer. From sunrise to sunset The Piazza Alta delivers a luxurious and invigorating lifestyle. Take the first step towards your own dream space by visiting us today. *LIMITED TIME PROMOS AVAILABLE. PHOTOS OF MODEL UNIT. PARKING AVAILABLE AT AN ADDITIONAL COST. CALL FOR DETAILS*

title: A stunning one-bedroom, one-bathroom condo in a quiet
description:
You may entertain guests, live a normal life, and work from home in the roomy kitchen that is open to the living and office area. The washer/dryer, walk-in closet with built-in cabinetry, and ensuite bathroom are all located in the spacious bedroom. In addition to a premium parking space in the garage of the building, this apartment also has an additional storage cage in the common passageways. Welcome to the magnificent York Square that Cecil Baker &
Partners created. A stunning one-bedroom, one-bathroom condo in a quiet, full service building that allows pets and has a 24-hour doorman and concierge, a gym, private storage, and a manicured courtyard. Large windows brighten the
apartment, which also has high ceilings and hardwood floors throughout. The newly renovated kitchen boasts stainless appliances, lots of cabinetry, and granite countertops. At the kitchen peninsula, a raised glass breakfast bar offers casual dining or buffet-style serving. The apartment also has all appliances, all window coverings, and a washer and dryer from 2018. The gorgeous York Square building has two elevators, a fitness center, a common room, and a beautifully planted courtyard. This neighborhood, which is tucked away in Old City, offers residents quick access to I-95 and the Vine Street Expressway as well as some of Philadelphia's top dining establishments. Don't pass up the chance to name York Square your residence

description:
The studio apartment home at 2512 is available for lease at this moment! This 400 square foot Dali studio apartment home on the 25th floor (of 26 floors) features large windows that face south and have a view of Chancellor Street and South Philadelphia. Be the first to enjoy a newly renovated kitchen and bathroom! This kitchen will be fully-equipped with a dishwasher, disposal, microwave, and gas stove. This home will have wood floors. The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home as early as November 1, 2022!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to shopping, dining, and more! Go grocery shopping at the Rittenhouse Market, Trader Joe's, Giant, Target, Di Bruno Bros., Reading Terminal Market, Giant Heirloom Market, Aldi, Sprouts, and Whole Foods. Browse the books at Barnes & Noble. Shop at the retail stores on Rittenhouse Row such as Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, gorjana, Paper Source, J. Crew, Vince, Urban Outfitters, Tselaine, MAC Cosmetics, Sephora, and Nordstrom Rack. Relax with a manicure and pedicure at Philly Nails Bar, Nail Spa Bar, or Coco Blue Spruce. Dine out at Rouge, Devon, Parc, Via Locusta, Barclay Prime, Pietro's, Pizzeria Vetri, Tria Cafe Rittenhouse, The Love, The Continental Mid-town, and Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Savor a coffee at La Colombe, Ultimo, Alchemy, or Elixr. Have a beautiful French dessert at Miel Patisserie. Indulge in a decadent Sunday brunch at Green Eggs. Savor scoops of gelato from Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Indulge in ice cream at Van Leeuwen and Jeni's. Stroll across the park and then buy a French baguette at Metropolitan Bakery or pick up a turkey club at Marathon on the Square. Grab a brookie from The Bakeshop on 20th. Catch a show at one of the many nearby theaters. Wander around the Rodin Museum or or the current exhibition at the Franklin Institute. Shop at the weekly farmer's market every Saturday and Tuesday from 9 to 2. There is so much to do in this area!

* Dishwasher

title: MOVE-IN SPECIAL! Luxury 3BD/3Bath New Construction House
description:
Newly constructed spacious house for rent! Special attention has been given to each and every detail in the building of this state-of-the-art home. Located in the Grays Ferry section of South Philadelphia, in close proximity to University of Pennsylvania, High way I-76 and the retail corridor, this home is surrounded by numerous new constructions and recent rehab projects.
This gorgeous home has 3 bedrooms with 3 custom bathrooms. The home boasts hardwood flooring, recessed lighting, smoke/carbon monoxide detectors, fire-sprinkler system, and is also cable ready. Enter the home to be greeted by a well-lit and spacious grand living room. Past the sun-lit grand living room you will find your state-of-the-art open galley kitchen. The beautifully appointed kitchen is outfitted with soft-close cabinets, modern Quartz counter-tops, contemporary backsplash, deep sink with chef's faucet, SS Samsung appliance package (dishwasher, fridge, range, microwave), and under cabinet lighting. From the kitchen via you will find the entrance to your private backyard. From the first floor, commercial grade Pine staircases (secured by custom railing) lead you up to the 2nd level of the house. Here the home presents a large room with a spacious organized closet, a huge bathroom with a custom vanity set, and laundry room. Following the staircase to the 3rd level, you enter to your own private oasis. The 3rd floor has another large bedroom, custom spa-like bathroom, and a spacious closet! The master bath boasts custom tile-work, dual vanity set, soaking tub and a designer rainfall shower. Take another step up the stairs to the pilot-house where you will find the access to your private dual rooftop decks. The home has electric and water lines on the rooftop, making it an ideal area to host parties and get-togethers. The finished basement offers another spacious bedroom or home office, custom full bathroom, and utility closet.
Extra included bonuses: Large High Energy Efficient windows, Built-in (Bluetooth enabled) speakers in living room & master bedroom, energy efficient DUAL zoned HVAC, organized closet shelving system, Nest camera in front and rear of home, Schlage keyless door lock in front, LED recessed lighting, digital thermostats, and much more! MUST SEE! Home has approximately 1850 SqFt of living space. Located close to public transportation, highway, nightlife, grocery stores, and restaurants. Ask us about our Move-In special for September 2022!

title: Newly constructed spacious house for rent!
description:
Newly constructed spacious house for rent! Special attention has been given to each and every detail in the building of this state-of-the-art home. Located in the Grays Ferry section of South Philadelphia, in close proximity to University of Pennsylvania, High way I-76 and the retail corridor, this home is surrounded by numerous new constructions and recent rehab projects.
This gorgeous home has 3 bedrooms with 3 custom bathrooms. The home boasts hardwood flooring, recessed lighting, low VOC paint throughout the house, smoke/carbon monoxide detectors, fire-sprinkler system, and is also cable ready. Enter the home to be greeted by a well-lit and spacious grand living room. Past the sun-lit grand living room you will find your state-of-the-art open galley kitchen. The beautifully appointed kitchen is outfitted with soft-close cabinets, modern Quartz counter-tops, contemporary backsplash, deep sink with chef's faucet, SS Samsung appliance package (dishwasher, fridge, range, microwave), and under cabinet lighting. From the kitchen via you will find the entrance to your private backyard. From the first floor, commercial grade Pine staircases (secured by custom railing) lead you up to the 2nd level of the house. Here the home presents a large room with a spacious organized closet, a huge bathroom with a custom vanity set, and laundry room. Following the staircase to the 3rd level, you enter to your own private oasis. The 3rd floor has another large bedroom, custom spa-like bathroom, and a spacious closet! The master bath boasts custom tile-work, dual vanity set, soaking tub and a designer rainfall shower. Take another step up the stairs to the pilot-house where you will find the access to your private dual rooftop decks. The home has electric and water lines on the rooftop, making it an ideal area to host parties and get-togethers. The finished basement offers another spacious bedroom or home office, custom full bathroom, and utility closet.
Extra included bonuses: Large High Energy Efficient windows, Built-in (Bluetooth enabled) speakers in living room & master bedroom, energy efficient DUAL zoned HVAC, organized closet shelving system, Nest camera in front and rear of home, Schlage keyless door lock in front, LED recessed lighting, digital thermostats, and much more! MUST SEE! Home has approximately 1850 SqFt of living space. Located close to public transportation, highway, nightlife, grocery stores, and restaurants.

Welcome home to Alder Court (aka 1035 Lombard Street #4)! A serene and very private & secured urban oasis surrounded by picturesque landscaping nestled in the heart of coveted Washington Square West. This stunning, light filled 3- story, 3 bedroom/2.5 bath home, with 2 outdoor spaces and a fabulous finished lower level is a must-see! Approaching this very special home, you will first experience the large front patio paved in sleek tile. Then upon entering, open the door to the sun drenched open floor plan featuring the gorgeous kitchen with impressive 42 inch maple cabinetry, stainless appliances & farm house sink, elegant granite counter tops, glass subway tile backsplash, built-in wine rack, a huge breakfast bar with pendant lighting and a picturesque view of the courtyard all open to the living/dining room with floor to ceiling windows and recessed lighting. The second floor offers 2 very spacious bedrooms flooded with natural light, ceiling fans and excellent closet space with decorative closet doors. The renovated hallway bathroom features 2 stylish vessel sink vanities and a tumbled tiled shower. The laundry area completes this floor. Heading to the third floor to the fabulous master bedroom suite with a vaulted ceiling, rolling barn closet doors, recessed lighting, a luxurious master bathroom with 2 modern extra large vanities and an oversized glass tile shower opens to the wonderful private roof top deck! The lower level showcases a spectacular family room with attractive custom built-ins, a powder room and 2 large storage closets. Gleaming hardwood floors throughout every room. There is a large storage shed off the patio. The Parking Spot is located just a half a block away at the corner of Quince & Lombard in a secured lot for separate purchase or rent. title: Newly constructed spacious house for rent!
description:
Newly constructed spacious house for rent! Special attention has been given to each and every detail in the building of this state-of-the-art home. Located in the Grays Ferry section of South Philadelphia, in close proximity to University of Pennsylvania, High way I-76 and the retail corridor, this home is surrounded by numerous new constructions and recent rehab projects.
This gorgeous home has 3 bedrooms with 3 custom bathrooms. The home boasts hardwood flooring, recessed lighting, low VOC paint throughout the house, smoke/carbon monoxide detectors, fire-sprinkler system, and is also cable ready. Enter the home to be greeted by a well-lit and spacious grand living room. Past the sun-lit grand living room you will find your state-of-the-art open galley kitchen. The beautifully appointed kitchen is outfitted with soft-close cabinets, modern Quartz counter-tops, contemporary backsplash, deep sink with chef's faucet, SS Samsung appliance package (dishwasher, fridge, range, microwave), and under cabinet lighting. From the kitchen via you will find the entrance to your private backyard. From the first floor, commercial grade Pine staircases (secured by custom railing) lead you up to the 2nd level of the house. Here the home presents a large room with a spacious organized closet, a huge bathroom with a custom vanity set, and laundry room. Following the staircase to the 3rd level, you enter to your own private oasis. The 3rd floor has another large bedroom, custom spa-like bathroom, and a spacious closet! The master bath boasts custom tile-work, dual vanity set, soaking tub and a designer rainfall shower. Take another step up the stairs to the pilot-house where you will find the access to your private dual rooftop decks. The home has electric and water lines on the rooftop, making it an ideal area to host parties and get-togethers. The finished basement offers another spacious bedroom or home office, custom full bathroom, and utility closet.
Extra included bonuses: Large High Energy Efficient windows, Built-in (Bluetooth enabled) speakers in living room & master bedroom, energy efficient DUAL zoned HVAC, organized closet shelving system, Nest camera in front and rear of home, Schlage keyless door lock in front, LED recessed lighting, digital thermostats, and much more! MUST SEE! Home has approximately 1850 SqFt of living space. Located close to public transportation, highway, nightlife, grocery stores, and restaurants.
